templates.name: How can I reopen my credit account?
templates.content: Reopening your account needs to be done in-store with proper ID.

templates.name: When is the draw announced?
templates.content: The drawing is done quarterly, and winners are informed via phone and email.

templates.name: Phone Sales
templates.content: You can call virtual sales at 262-436-4600 and work with a virtual salesperson to find options. Let me know if you have any more questions or need help with anything else, I'm here!

templates.name: Price Match
templates.content: All price matches must be done in stores.

templates.name: Price adjustment request (not for retroactive discount requests)
templates.content: I'm afraid all price adjustments need to be done in-store with a sales manager. Apologies for the inconvenience!

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 262-436-4600 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/steinhafels/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/SteinhafelsFurniture

templates.name: Warranty policy
templates.content: You can take a look at our full warranty policy here: https://www.steinhafels.com/ServicePolicies

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://www.steinhafels.com/search/sale

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at customerservice@steinhafels.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here - https://www.steinhafels.com/policies

templates.name: How do I apply for a line credit?
templates.content: You can find more information at the following link - https://retailservices.wellsfargo.com/ahapp/init-app?m=2175007566&l=en_US

templates.name: Do you offer financing?
templates.content: Yes, we do offer financing for all purchases! You can find more information at the following link: https://steinhafels.attn.tv/sl/wjBSR8xE

templates.name: Phone Call/Callback Request
templates.content: The best way to request is to email us directly at customerservice@steinhafels.com, give us a call and leave a message at 262-436-4600. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Do you ship internationally?
templates.content: We don't ship internationally at the moment, but stay tuned in case we do decide to offer this feature sometime in the future!

templates.name: Do you remove old furniture during delivery?
templates.content: We don't remove furniture at the time of delivery with the exception of unsoiled mattresses with a $25 removal fee when we're delivering a mattress.

templates.name: What courier do you ship with?
templates.content: We have our own fleet of trucks and deliver all furniture directly to you, we don't ship anything.

templates.name: Store location
templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here - https://www.steinhafels.com/store-locations

templates.name: Existing order issues
templates.content: Sorry to hear that! Please reach out to customer service directly at customerservice@steinhafels.com or give us a call at 262-436-4600. One of my colleagues will be more than happy to help out!

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Depending on the availability of an item, delivery can take anywhere from days to weeks. Here's where you can enter your zip code to view current delivery times: https://portal.steinhafels.com/service/delivery-availability

templates.name: Can I ship at a specific date?
templates.content: You can check delivery availability at the following link: https://portal.steinhafels.com/service/delivery-availability

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at customerservice@steinhafels.com, give us a call at 262-436-4600 (Monday-Saturday 10am-7pm/Sunday 11am-6pm) or live chat with one of our reps on our website https://www.steinhafels.com/ Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Do you sell floor models?
templates.content: We don't sell floor models. Unless an item is in our clearance center, you'll be getting a new item from our warehouse.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I can check if that's possible. What's the order number, email address and the change you'd like to make?

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: Free mattress delivery is available on purchases of $998 or more (before tax) to select zip codes. Please note that clearance items are excluded.

templates.name: Service inquiries
templates.content: For service inquiries, please give us a call at 262-436-4600 (Monday-Saturday 10am-7pm/Sunday 11am-6pm). Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at customerservice@steinhafels.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: What's included in the In-Carton Drop-Off delivery?
templates.content: One delivery professional will drop-off to your curb, driveway, or garage. The customer is responsible for assembly and final placement in the home. Items are in original packing material and not inspected. A two-hour delivery window will be provided the day before delivery. This option is only available in the metro Milwaukee, Madison, and Kenosha/Racine markets and excludes clearance merchandise.

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start a return here: https://portal.steinhafels.com/service/returns

templates.name: What's included in Premier Delivery?
templates.content: Two delivery professionals will deliver, place items in your home, and assemble them (when applicable). Items are unwrapped, inspected and all packing materials are recycled. A two-hour delivery window will be provided the day before delivery.

templates.name: Do you have fabric samples?
templates.content: Fabric samples are only available in-store for special order options. Please feel free to contact the store directly, you can find us near you here - https://steinhafels.attn.tv/sl/Yn3UcLwv

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.steinhafels.com/search/sale

templates.name: Do you have VIP warranty?
templates.content: You can visit https://steinhafels.attn.tv/aipK7zZJUyp3 for any VIP warranty scheduling/claims.

templates.name: Do you bill the insurance?
templates.content: Please note that the customer is responsible for any insurance billing.

templates.name: If I pick up my item, do I have to assemble it?
templates.content: Any items picked up will require assembly.
